let ptemp = msg.payload["P_T"]
let phumi = msg.payload["P_H"]
let htemp = msg.payload["H_T"]
let date = msg.payload["date"]
let time = msg.payload["time"]
let s_t = msg.payload["S_T"]
let s_c = msg.payload["S_C"]
let s_d = msg.payload["S_D"]
let m = { 'Date': date, 'Time': time, 'PTemperature': ptemp, 'PHumidity': phumi, 'HTemperature': htemp, 'ST': s_t, 'SC': s_c, 'SD': s_d}
return { payload: m };

name: array format
func:
let ptemp = msg.payload["P_T"]
let ptemp_C = msg.payload["P_T_C"]
let ptemp_S = msg.payload["P_T_S"]
let phumi = msg.payload["P_H"]
let phumi_C = msg.payload["P_H_C"]
let phumi_S = msg.payload["P_H_S"]

let htemp = msg.payload["H_T"]
let htemp_C = msg.payload["H_T_C"]
let htemp_S = msg.payload["H_T_S"]

let sys_T = msg.payload["S_T"]
let sys_T_C = msg.payload["S_T_C"]
let sys_T_S = msg.payload["S_T_S"]

let sys_C = msg.payload["S_C"]
let sys_C_C = msg.payload["S_C_C"]
let sys_C_S = msg.payload["S_C_S"]

let sys_D = msg.payload["S_D"]
let sys_D_C = msg.payload["S_D_C"]
let sys_D_S = msg.payload["S_D_S"]

let wifi = msg.payload["wifi"]
let IP = msg.payload["IP"]
let lamp = msg.payload["lamp"]


msg.payload = [ptemp, ptemp_C, ptemp_S, 
               phumi, phumi_C, phumi_S, 
               htemp, htemp_C, htemp_S, 
               sys_T, sys_T_C, sys_T_S, 
               sys_C, sys_C_C, sys_C_S, 
               sys_D, sys_D_C, sys_D_S, 
               wifi, IP, lamp]
return msg;

name: string format
func:
let ptemp = msg.payload["P_T"]
let ptemp_C = msg.payload["P_T_C"]
let ptemp_S = msg.payload["P_T_S"]
let phumi = msg.payload["P_H"]
let phumi_C = msg.payload["P_H_C"]
let phumi_S = msg.payload["P_H_S"]

let htemp = msg.payload["H_T"]
let htemp_C = msg.payload["H_T_C"]
let htemp_S = msg.payload["H_T_S"]

let sys_T = msg.payload["S_T"]
let sys_T_C = msg.payload["S_T_C"]
let sys_T_S = msg.payload["S_T_S"]

let sys_C = msg.payload["S_C"]
let sys_C_C = msg.payload["S_C_C"]
let sys_C_S = msg.payload["S_C_S"]

let sys_D = msg.payload["S_D"]
let sys_D_C = msg.payload["S_D_C"]
let sys_D_S = msg.payload["S_D_S"]

let wifi = msg.payload["wifi"]
let IP = msg.payload["IP"]
let lamp = msg.payload["lamp"]

let app = msg.payload["appDelay"]

let userid = msg.payload["userid"]
let userpass = msg.payload["userpass"]

msg.payload = `${ptemp};${ptemp_C};${ptemp_S};
                ${phumi};${phumi_C};${phumi_S};
                ${htemp};${htemp_C};${htemp_S};
                ${sys_T};${sys_T_C};${sys_T_S};
                ${sys_C};${sys_C_C};${sys_C_S};
                ${sys_D};${sys_D_C};${sys_D_S};
                ${wifi};${IP};${lamp};${app};
                ${userid};${userpass}`
return msg;
